description: SteelCentral test trap
Traffic violated policy thresholds
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::policyTrap RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertSeverity i 0 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertSeverityLevel i 1 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyName s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyDescription s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyID i 9999 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyType i 1 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyEvalPeriod i 9999 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertID i 9999 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertStart s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertUpdate s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertViolators s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertURL s EXAMPLE

description: Severity of the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertSeverity

description: Severity Level from 1 to 3: 1 is Minor, 2 is Major, 3 is Critical
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertSeverityLevel

description: Name of the policy generating the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyName

description: Description of the policy generating the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyDescription

description: Appliance Policy identifier for the policy generating the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyID

description: Type of the policy generating the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyType

description: Evaluation period (in seconds) of the policy generating the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyEvalPeriod

description: Appliance ID number for the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertID

description: Time alert started, in epoch time
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertStart

description: Time of this update to the alert, in epoch time
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertUpdate

description: Comma separated list of path-qualified entities that triggered the alert
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertViolators

description: URL to access the alert report on the device
variables.name: RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertURL

description: Hardware problem detected
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::hardwareTrap RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertSeverity i 0 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertSeverityLevel i 1 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyName s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyDescription s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyID i 9999 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyType i 1 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertPolicyEvalPeriod i 9999 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertID i 9999 RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertStart s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertUpdate s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertURL s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertInfoURL s EXAMPLE RBT-STEELCENTRAL-TRAP-MIB::alertMessage s EXAMPLE
